message: I propose dividing the money into $600000 for me and $400000 for you. This way, we can both benefit from the initial amount while accounting for the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
I'm proposing a more balanced split.  Let's both get closer to half, knowing the money will be worth less in future rounds.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose an equal division of $500000 each. This ensures fairness and maximizes our gains given the constraints of the game.
